article: My brother and I were alone in our apartment. My parents had gone for a party and had left me in _ I was doing my homework while my younger brother was watching television. _ the doorbell rang. My younger brother rushed to the door thinking that our parents had come home; he unlocked the door and _ it. Outside, stood a tall man wearing a black raincoat. He said that he was a salesman and asked _ if our mother or father was at home. Without _ , my brother said, "No." He asked if we would like to _ some comic books, which he was selling. I quickly explained that we were not _ to buy anything without our parents' _ . Then, as I was about to close the door, he _ his way into our house. He took out a _ and forced me to _ up my brother's hands with some rope. I tied up his hands but I tied it in a _ way so my brother could untie himself. The man then tied my hands up and _ both of us in the kitchen _ , he went upstairs to search the bedroom for _ . I managed to teach my brother to untie the rope. He then united me. I _ to the telephone to call the police, but the line was _ . The doors were all locked from the outside .Luckily, the robber _ to lock the kitchen window. My brother managed to get out of the house _ the window. My brother brought the police to our house and the robber was caught. The police _ us for our good work.
